scripts.explain-full-install: echo "Installs Node Module for FrontEnd (React) as well as Backend (Express)"
scripts.full-install: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.explain-full: echo "Compiling FrontEnd and Starting Backend Server
scripts.full: echo "Switching Directory & Building" && cd frontend && npm run build && echo "Switching Back and Running App" && cd .. && node app.js
